foreignData.name: Bewahrer der Toten
foreignData.text: {B}, {T}: Zerstöre eine nicht-schwarze Kreatur Deiner Wahl. Benutze diese Fähigkeit nur, wenn der Beherrscher der Kreatur mindestens zwei Kreaturenkarten weniger auf seinem Friedhof hat als Du.

name: Keeper of the Dead
originalText:
o
B, oc
T: Destroy target nonblack creature. Play this ability only if that creature's controller has at least two fewer creature cards in his or her graveyard than you have in yours.

rulings.text: A different opposing player may be targeted each time the ability is activated.
It is only necessary that the condition be true as you activate the ability. The ability will still resolve normally even if the condition is no longer true at that time.

text: {B}, {T}: Choose target opponent who had at least two fewer creature cards in their graveyard than you did as you activated this ability. Destroy target nonblack creature that player controls.
